definitions: relating to or denoting the region of the sea or seabed relatively close to a shore

examples.text: volunteers monitor humpback whales in nearshore waters
corals are essential to the nearshore ecosystem

shortDefinitions: of region of sea or seabed relatively close to shore

definitions: relating to the transfer of a business operation to a nearby country

examples.text: we set up a nearshore operation in Poland

shortDefinitions: relating to transfer of business operation to nearby country

definitions: (of a company) transfer (a business operation) to a nearby country, especially in preference to a more distant location

examples.text: many capital market firms are starting to nearshore their operations

shortDefinitions: transfer business operation to nearby country
